short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Moves Userdefined variables before builtinvariables in GTM variables view. Enables save on Crtl+s and preview tags on Ctrl+P.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you tired of the built-in variables being displayed above the user-defined variables in google tag manager variables view?
This extension moves the user defined variables to the top.

Now you can also toggle save with shortcut. When working with tags, triggers, variables etc. you can save your work using "ctrl + s", though you'll have to toggle it on by clicking the extension icon and flipping the switch. 

** Release notes
-Version 0.0.0.10 Removed unused permissions

-Version 0.0.0.9 Fixed bug where exention would not always run.

-In Version 0.0.0.8 You can save with the shortcut "ctrl+s" in marketing platform admin view.

-In Version 0.0.0.7 you can preview your container by the shortcut "ctrl+p", but first you'll have to toggle it on by clicking the extension icon and flipping that switch.
